intro: Stellaster arvensis, commonly known as the field starwort, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its small, star-shaped yellow flowers that bloom in the summer months. The plant typically grows in moist, disturbed soils and is often found in meadows, fields, and along roadsides. Stellaster arvensis has a basal rosette of leaves and produces a slender flowering stem. It is a herbaceous perennial that is often overlooked due to its modest appearance.
